name: Room of Madness
description:
A short still unfinished game in the spirit of Mad Max.

The theme we used was "Contract" in the meaning of shrinking.

Programmers:

Georgi "killercho" Nikolov

Todor "Ted" Dukov

 Aleksandar "Alemak" Makedonski

Artists:

Evgeni "BubbleShinobi" Petrov
